description: Variation of condition 2 (Approved Plans) of planning permission PP/2013/2248 dated 7/08/2013 for Demolition of existing pair of semi-detached, two storey properties, and replacement with a six storey building incorporating retail uses (A1/A2/A3 Use Classes) at ground floor level (261.5 sqm net), and nine residential units (7x 2 bedroom flats and 2x 3 bedroom flats) over the upper five floor levels, integrated balconies, bicycle storage, and refuse and recycling storage areas (amendments comprising of internal and external alterations to the plan form, elevations, balconies and enhanced amenity spaces).
decision_conditions: Varied condition 2 shall read:  2. The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing title numbers: F2943(P-)01A; F2943(P-)02A; F2943(P-)03A; F2943(P-)04A; F2943(P-)05A; F2943(P-)07A; F2943(P-)08A; F2943(P-)09A; and F2943(P-)10A unless otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority.
